ch0066_01_boss/0101_0701_01_10:
You’re here again today, I see. I suppose that
deserves some credit, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0066_01_boss/0101_0701_02_10:
Pasio is my creation! Battle here to your
heart’s content!
ch0066_01_boss/7101_0701_01_10:
Creating the PML was my idea, but I let Rachel
and Sawyer run it.
ch0066_01_boss/7101_0701_02_10: But now, I also help them out a bit, of course.
ch0066_01_boss/7101_0701_03_10:
And why wouldn’t I? Checking the work of my
retainers is my job!
ch0066_01_boss/7102_0701_01_10:
Hear my words! I’ve thought of the perfect item
we can sell here on Pasio as a souvenir!
ch0066_01_boss/7102_0701_02_10:
Of course, I mean these sunglasses! Everyone
will want a pair!
ch0066_01_boss/7102_0701_03_10:
If we add a few more color variations, they’re
sure to become a big hit! Bwahahaha!
ch0066_01_boss/7102_0701_04_10: Hm? Why are you looking at me like that?
ch0066_01_boss/7103_0701_01_10: That Hoopa played another trick on me!
ch0066_01_boss/7103_0701_02_10:
How dare it wake me up by dropping things on
my head!
ch0066_01_boss/7103_0701_03_10:
Hoopa, just you wait! You’ll feel my wrath and
regret you ever messed with me!
ch0066_01_boss/7104_0701_01_10:
Pasio is still a work in progress...and I don’t think
I’ll ever consider Pasio’s development complete.
ch0066_01_boss/7104_0701_02_10:
After all, we keep adding new construction
whenever we find new ways to battle and
enjoy the island.
ch0066_01_boss/7104_0701_03_10:
One day, Pasio will be the best paradise in the
world for people to enjoy! I guarantee it!
ch0066_01_boss/7105_0701_01_10:
Tell me, [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you
have people who are important to you?
ch0066_01_boss/7105_0701_02_10:
Whoever you thought of just now, be sure to
take care of them. Consider it some advice from
me to you.
ch0066_01_boss/7105_0701_03_10:
You never know when you won’t be able to see
someone anymore...so be sure to live without
regrets.
ch0066_01_boss/1701_0701_01_10: Rejoice, for I have something for you!
ch0066_01_boss/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s a present from me! Make it your
family treasure.
ch0066_01_boss/2501_0701_01_10:
Team Break was Pasio’s biggest disgrace.
All they did was try to take out their own anger
and frustration on others.
ch0066_01_boss/2501_0701_02_10:
But...I also failed to listen to their problems as the
host and creator of this place.
ch0066_01_boss/2501_0701_03_10: That was a disgrace for me as well.
ch0066_01_boss/2501_0702_01_10: My actions have an effect on others.
ch0066_01_boss/2501_0702_02_10:
That doesn’t apply just to me. Your actions can
affect others, too.
ch0066_01_boss/2501_0702_03_10:
You should keep that in mind if you don’t want to
repeat my mistakes.
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0701_01_10:
Everything I do here on Pasio is reported to my
father back home.
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0701_02_10:
He’s a very strict man. If I go home as I am now,
he wouldn’t allow me to take the throne.
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0701_03_10: But...I don’t plan on keeping it that way.
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0701_04_10:
I will definitely find a way to make him recognize
my greatness and allow me to succeed the throne!
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0702_01_10:
As long as I give it my best effort and have
Sawyer and the others on my side, I can
do anything!
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0702_02_10:
One day, my team will challenge you to
another battle!
ch0066_01_boss/2511_0702_03_10:
When that time comes, it’s my team that will win,
so be prepared!
ch0066_01_boss/3001_0701_01_10:
Bwahahahahaaa!
There! Now I can TRULY start my day!
ch0066_01_boss/3003_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles can happen anytime, anywhere.
So come on! I’m challenging you to a match,
here and now!
ch0066_01_boss/3005_0701_01_10:
Rachel and Sawyer escorted me the entire day
without a complaint. I should thank them when
I return home for the night.
